definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
a woman's virtue is to have no talent (idiom)
pinyin: nu:3 zi3 wu2 cai2 bian4 shi4 de2

definition: see 曼荷蓮學院|曼荷莲学院[Man4 he2 lian2 Xue2 yuan4]
pinyin: Man4 he2 lian2 Nu:3 zi3 Xue2 yuan4

definition: woman from a respectable family/respectable woman

sentences.english: I strongly believe that Japanese high school girls are the sexiest female living creature in this world.
sentences.chinese: 我深信日本女子高生是世上最性感的雌性生物。

sentences.english: A noblewoman holding the rank of viscount in her own right.
sentences.chinese: 本人拥有子爵权利的女子爵。

sentences.english: Security officials rushed down the main aisle to detain the woman.
sentences.chinese: 安全官员立马冲进主通道，扣留了该名女子。

sentences.english: Among them was Zhang Ning, a female badminton player, who impressed me deeply.
sentences.chinese: 但最打动我的是女子羽毛球运动员张宁。

sentences.english: And Shechem spake unto his father Hamor, saying, Get me this damsel to wife.
sentences.chinese: 4示剑对他父亲哈抹说，求你为我聘这女子为妻。

sentences.english: The world is really foxy woman?
sentences.chinese: 世间也真有如狐般的女子吗？

sentences.english: Many daughters have done virtuously, but thou excellest them all.
sentences.chinese: 说，才德的女子很多，惟独你超过一切。

sentences.english: The hero of the story is in love with a woman who--alas and alack--does not love him.
sentences.chinese: 主角爱上了一位女子，可是那女子并不爱他。

sentences.english: The hero of the story is in love with a woman who--alas and alack--does not love him.
sentences.chinese: 主角爱上了一位女子，可是那女子并不爱他。

sentences.english: In China's big cities, real estate's expensive and young women are in short supply.
sentences.chinese: 中国的大城市，房价高企，年轻女子的行市紧俏。

sentences.english: Women of middle and lower classer have been laboring in different trades and seeking for economic independence.
sentences.chinese: 中下层女子从事各种行业的劳动，谋求经济自立。

sentences.english: I mean, you're a grown woman.
sentences.chinese: 她长大后成为一位亭亭玉立的女子。

sentences.english: A holiday wish from your son Tom.
sentences.chinese: 寄上佳节的祝愿，你们的女子汤姆敬上。

sentences.english: Dwarven women are sturdy and nearly as tough as their men folk.
sentences.chinese: 矮人女子几乎和他们的男性一样强壮。

sentences.english: And the silence, such as fox woman also had to sigh sigh?
sentences.chinese: 而那寂静山林，如狐女子也可曾对月叹惋过？

sentences.english: But this girl was a non-believer.
sentences.chinese: 况且，这个女子是一个异教徒。

definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
